original_text: and you shall not forget the covenant that I have made with you. You shall not fear other gods,
korean_text: 또 내가 너희와 세운 언약을 잊지 말며 다른 신들을 경외하지 말고

sentences.original_text: and you shall not forget the covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 그 언약을 잊지 말라

sentences.original_text: that I have made with you.
You shall not fear other gods,
